languages.text: {n}Ваш собеседник чеканит:{/n} "Комиссар Иако Сотний, но мои соратники предпочитают звать меня просто Комиссар. Приписан к полку Веккентийских зуавов, в ходе сражения на мире Кемальт Секундус был ранен и в беспамятстве захвачен в плен. Оправившись от ран, продолжаю борьбу с богохульными {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}ксеносами{/g}, организовал и возглавляю ячейку сопротивления".

traits.locale_text: {n}Ваш собеседник чеканит:{/n} "Комиссар Иако Сотний, но мои соратники предпочитают звать меня просто Комиссар. Приписан к полку Веккентийских зуавов, в ходе сражения на мире Кемальт Секундус был ранен и в беспамятстве захвачен в плен. Оправившись от ран, продолжаю борьбу с богохульными {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}ксеносами{/g}, организовал и возглавляю ячейку сопротивления".
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}The man replies with clipped precision,{/n} "Commissar Iako Sotniy, but my brothers and sisters in arms prefer to call me simply 'the Commissar.' I was assigned to a regiment of the Vickentian Zouaves, and I fought in the battle for the world of Kemalt Secundus, where I was wounded and taken prisoner while unconscious. Having recovered from my wounds, I carry on fighting the wicked {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} as the head of the local resistance cell, which I founded."

languages.text: {n}这个人简明扼要地回答着你的问题。{/n}“我是伊科·索蒂尼政委，但我的兄弟姐妹们更喜欢直接叫我‘政委’。我被分配到了维肯迪安·苏亚维的军团，参加了柯玛特二号星的战斗。我在那场战斗中受了伤，不省人事，成了异形的俘虏。伤愈之后，我在当地成立了反抗军。我负责领导我的战友，继续与邪恶的{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}异形{/g}战斗。”
languages.original_text: {n}The man replies with clipped precision,{/n} "Commissar Iako Sotniy, but my brothers and sisters in arms prefer to call me simply 'the Commissar.' I was assigned to a regiment of the Vickentian Zouaves, and I fought in the battle for the world of Kemalt Secundus, where I was wounded and taken prisoner while unconscious. Having recovered from my wounds, I carry on fighting the wicked {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} as the head of the local resistance cell, which I founded."

traits.locale_text: {n}这个人简明扼要地回答着你的问题。{/n}“我是伊科·索蒂尼政委，但我的兄弟姐妹们更喜欢直接叫我‘政委’。我被分配到了维肯迪安·苏亚维的军团，参加了柯玛特二号星的战斗。我在那场战斗中受了伤，不省人事，成了异形的俘虏。伤愈之后，我在当地成立了反抗军。我负责领导我的战友，继续与邪恶的{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}异形{/g}战斗。”
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}男は歯切れよく答えた。{/n}「コミッサーのイアコ・ソトニーと申しますが、仲間には"コミッサー"と呼ばれています。ヴィケンチアン・ズアベスの連隊に配属され、惑星ケマルト・セクダスでの戦中に負傷し、意識不明のまま捕虜になりました。回復した今、自分が創設した地元のレジスタンス組織のリーダーとして、邪悪な{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}異種族{/g}たちと戦い続けています」
languages.original_text: {n}The man replies with clipped precision,{/n} "Commissar Iako Sotniy, but my brothers and sisters in arms prefer to call me simply 'the Commissar.' I was assigned to a regiment of the Vickentian Zouaves, and I fought in the battle for the world of Kemalt Secundus, where I was wounded and taken prisoner while unconscious. Having recovered from my wounds, I carry on fighting the wicked {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} as the head of the local resistance cell, which I founded."

traits.locale_text: {n}男は歯切れよく答えた。{/n}「コミッサーのイアコ・ソトニーと申しますが、仲間には"コミッサー"と呼ばれています。ヴィケンチアン・ズアベスの連隊に配属され、惑星ケマルト・セクダスでの戦中に負傷し、意識不明のまま捕虜になりました。回復した今、自分が創設した地元のレジスタンス組織のリーダーとして、邪悪な{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}異種族{/g}たちと戦い続けています」
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}El hombre responde con precisión perfecta.{/n} «Comisario Iako Sotniy, pero mis compañeros de armas prefieren llamarme tan solo Comisario. Estaba asignado a un regimiento de los Zuavos Vickentianos y luché en la batalla por el mundo de Kemalt Secundus, donde resulté herido y acabé apresado tras caer inconsciente. Ahora que me he recuperado de mis heridas, lidero la lucha contra los pérfidos {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} al mando de la resistencia local, establecida por mí mismo».
languages.original_text: {n}The man replies with clipped precision,{/n} "Commissar Iako Sotniy, but my brothers and sisters in arms prefer to call me simply 'the Commissar.' I was assigned to a regiment of the Vickentian Zouaves, and I fought in the battle for the world of Kemalt Secundus, where I was wounded and taken prisoner while unconscious. Having recovered from my wounds, I carry on fighting the wicked {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} as the head of the local resistance cell, which I founded."

Estaba asignado a un regimiento de los Zuavos Vickentianos y luché en la batalla por el mundo de Kemalt Secundus, donde resulté herido y acabé apresado tras caer inconsciente. Ahora que me he recuperado de mis heridas, lidero la lucha contra los pérfidos {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} al mando de la resistencia local, establecida por mí mismo».
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.original_text: {n}The man replies with clipped precision,{/n} "Commissar Iako Sotniy, but my brothers and sisters in arms prefer to call me simply 'the Commissar.' I was assigned to a regiment of the Vickentian Zouaves, and I fought in the battle for the world of Kemalt Secundus, where I was wounded and taken prisoner while unconscious. Having recovered from my wounds, I carry on fighting the wicked xenos as the head of the local resistance cell, which I founded."

languages.text: {n}L'homme vous répond sur un ton presque militaire :{/n} « Commissaire Iako Sotniy, mais mes frères et sœurs d'armes m'appellent tout simplement le commissaire. Après avoir été affecté à un régiment des Zouaves vickentiens, j'ai participé à la bataille de Kemalt Secundus, où j'ai été blessé puis fait prisonnier alors que j'étais inconscient. Une fois remis de mes blessures, j'ai fondé une cellule de résistance locale dont j'ai pris la tête pour poursuivre la lutte contre les {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xénos{/g}. »
languages.original_text: {n}The man replies with clipped precision,{/n} "Commissar Iako Sotniy, but my brothers and sisters in arms prefer to call me simply 'the Commissar.' I was assigned to a regiment of the Vickentian Zouaves, and I fought in the battle for the world of Kemalt Secundus, where I was wounded and taken prisoner while unconscious. Having recovered from my wounds, I carry on fighting the wicked {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} as the head of the local resistance cell, which I founded."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'homme vous répond sur un ton presque militaire :{/n} « Commissaire Iako Sotniy, mais mes frères et sœurs d'armes m'appellent tout simplement le commissaire. Après avoir été affecté à un régiment des Zouaves vickentiens, j'ai participé à la bataille de Kemalt Secundus, où j'ai été blessé puis fait prisonnier alors que j'étais inconscient. Une fois remis de mes blessures, j'ai fondé une cellule de résistance locale dont j'ai pris la tête pour poursuivre la lutte contre les {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xénos{/g}. »
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}Der Mann antwortet mit knapper Präzision:{/n} "Kommissar Iako Sotniy, aber meine Waffenbrüder und -schwestern nennen mich einfach 'Kommissar'. Ich war einem Regiment der Vicentinischen Zuaven zugeteilt und habe in der Schlacht um die Welt Kemalt Secundus gekämpft, bei der ich verwundet und im bewusstlosen Zustand gefangengenommen wurde. Meine Wunden sind nun verheilt, und ich kämpfe weiter gegen die schändlichen {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g}, indem ich die hiesige Widerstandszelle leite, die ich auch gegründet habe."
languages.original_text: {n}The man replies with clipped precision,{/n} "Commissar Iako Sotniy, but my brothers and sisters in arms prefer to call me simply 'the Commissar.' I was assigned to a regiment of the Vickentian Zouaves, and I fought in the battle for the world of Kemalt Secundus, where I was wounded and taken prisoner while unconscious. Having recovered from my wounds, I carry on fighting the wicked {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} as the head of the local resistance cell, which I founded."

Ich war einem Regiment der Vicentinischen Zuaven zugeteilt und habe in der Schlacht um die Welt Kemalt Secundus gekämpft, bei der ich verwundet und im bewusstlosen Zustand gefangengenommen wurde. Meine Wunden sind nun verheil, und ich kämpfe weiter gegen die schändlichen {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g}, indem ich die hiesige Widerstandszelle leite, die ich auch gegründet habe."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}Adam, kısa ve öz bir şekilde cevap veriyor.{/n} "Komiser İako Sotniy. Silah arkadaşlarım bana kısaca 'Komiser' der. Viçkentiya Erleri alayına atandım, Kemalt Secundus dünyası muharebesinde yaralanıp baygınken esir düştüm. Yaralarım iyileştiğinden beri kendi kurduğum yerel bir direniş örgütünün başı olarak aşağılık {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}zenolarla{/g} savaşmaya devam ediyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}The man replies with clipped precision,{/n} "Commissar Iako Sotniy, but my brothers and sisters in arms prefer to call me simply 'the Commissar.' I was assigned to a regiment of the Vickentian Zouaves, and I fought in the battle for the world of Kemalt Secundus, where I was wounded and taken prisoner while unconscious. Having recovered from my wounds, I carry on fighting the wicked {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} as the head of the local resistance cell, which I founded."

traits.locale_text: {n}Adam kısa ve öz bir şekilde cevap veriyor.{/n} "Komiser Iako Sotniy ama silah arkadaşlarım bana kısaca 'Komiser' derler. Vickentian Zouaves alayına atandım ve yaralanıp kendimde değilken esir alındığım Kemalt Secundus dünyası savaşında dövüştüm. Yaralarım iyileştiğinden beri kendi kurduğum yerel bir direniş örgütünün başı olarak aşağılık {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}zenolar{/g}la savaşmaya devam ediyorum."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True
